segments.text: The whether in Beijing is just beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Autumn is the best season in Beijing you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I can see . The summer heat is over . And the winter cold is still far away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the whether like in Washington at this time of this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Autumn is also very nice In Washington .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it very cold in winter there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . it isn ’ t . But sometimes it slows a lot in winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it rain a lot in summer there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Yes . Sometimes it rains very heavily
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There ’ s a lot of rain in summer . But it seldom rains in autumn
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel it ’ s rather dry here
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s true . many people from the south don ’ t like the whether here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I ’ m from the north . I was born in Beijing actually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . So this is your hometown ?
segments.speaker: S2
